犵字的基本解释

犵
gē
〔犵狫（
l僶 ）〕今作“仡佬”，中国西南地区少数民族之一。

犵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gē］
［《正字通》去逸切］
我国少数民族名。即仡佬。

犵字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　犵； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页706第17
【篇海】音紇。義闕。　又【正字通】去逸切，音詰。犵狫，蠻也。明田汝成炎徼紀聞：犵狫，一曰犵獠。種有五，蓬頭赤腳，輕命死黨。以布一幅，橫圍腰閒，旁無襞績，謂之桶裙，男女同制。花布者爲花犵狫，紅布者謂紅犵狫。各有族屬，不通婚姻。又打牙犵狫，慓悍尤甚。又剪頭犵狫，男女蓄髮寸許。又豬屎犵狫，喜不潔，與犬豕同牢，得獸卽咋食如狼。又狇狫。俗與犵狫同。掘地爲爐，厝火環臥，以牛衣藉之，不施被席。又貓犵狑獠四種，皆溪洞民，廣西桂林有犵獞。

犵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
犵字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Part Two] [Dog Character Department] 　犵; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 706 Page 17
[Pianhai] Yinhe. Righteous que.　【Zhengzitong】Go to Yiqie, sound interrogation.犵狫, quite also. Ming Tian Ru Cheng Yan Ji Wen: 犵狫, one says 犵獠. There are five kinds, unkempt and barefoot, and die-hard. With a piece of cloth, it is leisurely around the waist, and there is no fold next to it. The so-called barrel skirt is made of the same system for men and women. Those with floral cloths are called flower 犵狫, and those with red cloth are called red 犵狫. Each has an ethnic affiliation and no marriage is possible. He slapped his teeth again, especially fierce. They cut their heads again, and both men and women grow their hair. And pig dung is stubborn, happy and unclean, and jailed with dogs and hogs, and beasts eat like wolves. And 狇狫. Vulgar and 犵狫 are the same. Digging the ground as a furnace, lying in a ring of fire, borrowing it with a cow's clothing, and not using a quilt. There are four kinds of cats, all of them are the cavemen of Xixi, and there are cats of Guangxi and Guilin.
